content.raw: Yes.  Unfortunately, this doesn't completely get rid of boost, nor does it even completely get rid of boost::filesystem.  The last piece of boost::filesystem we use is the directory iterator, which was *very* complicated to port from Boost.  I haven't yet decided on what to do with that, but I figured I would make some progress here anyway.
content.html: Yes. Unfortunately, this doesn't completely get rid of boost, nor does it even completely get rid of boost::filesystem. The last piece of boost::filesystem we use is the directory iterator, which was very complicated to port from Boost. I haven't yet decided on what to do with that, but I figured I would make some progress here anyway.
